entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
